mapper.select: select pl.eno, name, mimg from plan pl inner join mento mte on mte.eno = pl.eno inner join membs mb on mb.mno = mte.eno where pl.cono = #{cono}
SELECT pl.plmap FROM plan pl inner join mento mte on mte.eno = pl.eno inner join membs mb on mb.mno = mte.eno WHERE pl.cono = #{cono}
select count(*) from plan pl left outer join contents c on pl.cono=c.cono

select plan.cono,mto.eno,name,mb.mimg,plmap,plimg, sarea from contents ctt inner join plan on plan.cono = ctt.cono inner join copic cp on ctt.cono = cp.cono inner join topic tp on cp.tno = tp.tno inner join snatr snt on tp.tno = snt.tno inner join res_define resdf on resdf.define = snt.define inner join result ret on ret.rer = resdf.define inner join membs mb on mb.mno = plan.eno inner join mento mto on mto.eno = mb.mno where ret.sno = 5 and mb.mno = plan.eno limit 4

select plan.cono,name,mb.mimg,plmap,plimg, sarea from contents ctt inner join plan on plan.cono = ctt.cono inner join copic cp on ctt.cono = cp.cono inner join topic tp on cp.tno = tp.tno inner join snatr snt on tp.tno = snt.tno inner join res_define resdf on resdf.define = snt.define inner join result ret on ret.rer = resdf.define inner join membs mb on mb.mno = plan.eno inner join mento mto on mto.eno = mb.mno where ret.sno = #{sno} and mb.mno = plan.eno limit #{startRowIndex}, #{rowSize}

SELECT name, mb.mno, mto.eno, pl.cono, plnm, plimg, sarea FROM plan pl inner join mento mto on mto.eno = pl.eno inner join membs mb on mb.mno = mto.eno WHERE pl.eno = #{eno} ORDER BY pl.cono DESC LIMIT 6
